message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $110?
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm really interested, but I'm hoping to pay closer to $105. Would you be willing to come down a bit?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I can do $108, but that's as low as I can go. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
